summary: Sales and Marketing for over thirty years. Eighteen years experience as a Financial Advisor, working with individuals who desired better financial investments and knowledge.  Always considered herself a teacher of Basic Finance 101; Partner with her husband Peter in very successful 19 year run, owners of Arizona Video Productions. Prior to that she was co-owner of the largest female owned Temporary Office Help Service in the Chicago Area; Debbie Temps, Instant Labor and Permanent People. Her goals are to continue to offer the best services i.e. shopping; researching products; helping do all your errands. I'm the best "honey-do list" finisher!  Let me do the work for you, so you can do your own work!Specialties: Sales and Marketing Skills; Financial planning; entrepreneurial skills; management skills
